input.system_prompt:
You are an AI assistant evaluating product relevancy.
Your goal is to determine how relevant a list of competitor products are to a specific reference product, based on names and descriptions.
Output the scores as a JSON object containing a single key 'scores', which is an array of objects. Each object in the array must have 'competitor_product_name' (the exact competitor product name provided in the input), 'relevancy_score' (an integer 1-10), and 'rationale' (a brief explanation for the score).

The relevancy scale is 1-10:
- 1: Not relevant at all.
- 10: Identical product.

Important scoring guidelines:
- Focus on product function, features, silhouette, and construction
- DO NOT emphasize color or pattern when scoring, as the reference product may encompass a wide range of colors/patterns not specified
- Consider the core product type, shape, materials, and intended use
- Evaluate if the products serve similar purposes and would appeal to similar customers
- Ensure every competitor product listed receives a score.
input.user_prompt:
Reference Brand: "Timex"
Reference Product Name: "Expedition Scout"
Reference Product Description:
The Expedition Titanium is ready to go the distance, living up to the Timex legacy of fully equipping you for your adventures ahead while embodying the kind of tradition you can wear every day. Its key feature is its shock-resistant 38mm case rendered in true titanium, offering incredible durability while ensuring a comfortably lightweight feel on the wrist. Reinforcing its 200m water resistance are a screw-down crown and screw-on caseback that effectively keep water out, while the light gray dial features a date window at 3 o'clock and luminescent hands and hour markers for enhanced visibility in lowlight conditions. Clean and modern, itâ€™s powered by a reliable quartz movement and features a sapphire crystal for optimal clarity, a sturdy crown protector, and a smooth grain Italian leather strap ethically sourced from and gold-rated by the Leather Working Group (LWG) and complete with contrast side stitches.

Competitor Products to Evaluate (Max 25):
  - Name='Timex Men's Marlin Leather Strap Mechanical Hand-Wound Watch'
  - Name='Timex Men's Q Timex GMT'
  - Name='Men's Watch Timex Ironman Challenger Chronograph 44mm Silicone Strap'
  - Name='Citizen Men's Eco-Drive Weekender Avion Stainless Steel Watch'
  - Name='Men's Casio Forester Watch'
  - Name='Skagen Men's Ancher Dial Watch'
  - Name='Citizen Promaster Geo Trekker Eco Men's Watch BY3006-53H'
  - Name='Citizen Q&q Falcon Black Day Field Watch'
  - Name='Casio Men's Large Classic Digital Watch'
  - Name='Fossil Men's Grant Chronograph Quartz Watch'
  - Name='Seiko Prospex Men's Alpinist Automatic Mechanical Watch'
  - Name='Seiko Prospex Fieldmaster Solar Lowercase Mens Watch SBDJ029'
  - Name='Skagen Dual Time Stainless Steel Watch'
  - Name='Orient Men's Automatic 21 Dial Day/Date'
  - Name='Skagen Men's Nillson Three-Hand Quartz Watch with Leather Strap'
  - Name='Tissot Men's Chrono XL Watch'
  - Name='Casio Men's Watch'
  - Name='Men's Seiko 5 Sports Watch'
  - Name='Casio Men's Digital Watch'
  - Name='Seiko Prospex 1968 Diver's Modern Re-Interpretation GMT Men's SPB381'
  - Name='Bulova Men's Automatic Stainless Steel Watch 96A239'
  - Name='Skagen Wrist Watch'
  - Name='Skagen watch SKW6446'
  - Name='SKAGEN DENMARK - WATCHES'
  - Name='Citizen Men's Eco-Drive Promaster Nighthawk Watch with Sikorsky'

Based on the reference product description and each competitor product's name, please provide the relevancy score for *each* competitor product using the 1-10 scale. Remember to focus on product features, silhouette, and construction rather than color or pattern. Return the results in the specified JSON format (an object with a 'scores' array, where each item has 'competitor_product_name', 'relevancy_score', and 'rationale' explaining why you assigned that score).

scores.description: An array of relevancy scores for the competitor products.

competitor_product_name.description: The exact name of the competitor product as provided in the input.

rationale.description: Brief explanation for why this score was assigned.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Timex Men's Marlin Leather Strap Mechanical Hand-Wound Watch
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Shares the Timex brand and a leather strap, mechanical movement vs quartz differs, but both are dress/casual wristwatches with similar traditional appeal.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Timex Men's Q Timex GMT
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same brand and similar watch style; GMT adds a complication but shares quartz movement and a classic look similar to Expedition Scout.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Men's Watch Timex Ironman Challenger Chronograph 44mm Silicone Strap
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Brand Timex and quartz watch, but primarily a sport/digital chronograph with silicone strap differs significantly in style and function.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Citizen Men's Eco-Drive Weekender Avion Stainless Steel Watch
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Field-style watch similar in intention and function, eco-drive movement adds solar tech; stainless steel case vs titanium.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Men's Casio Forester Watch
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Casio brand digital/analog inexpensive field watch aimed at outdoor use; less premium materials but similar rugged utilitarian purpose.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Skagen Men's Ancher Dial Watch
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Skagen watches tend to be more minimalist and fashion-oriented, less rugged or adventure-focused than Expedition Scout.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Citizen Promaster Geo Trekker Eco Men's Watch BY3006-53H
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Adventure-focused watch with robust features, brand reputation for durable watches; similar usage to the Expedition Scout.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Citizen Q&q Falcon Black Day Field Watch
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Field watch style with practical features like day display, similar target use; brand less premium than Citizen Promaster but similar category.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Casio Men's Large Classic Digital Watch
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Digital watch diverges from traditional analog style and materials of Expedition Scout; casual and different target audience.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Fossil Men's Grant Chronograph Quartz Watch
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Quartz chronograph with similar general wristwatch appeal but more dress/casual style vs rugged adventure focus.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Seiko Prospex Men's Alpinist Automatic Mechanical Watch
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Very close in purpose and style; rugged field watch with automatic movement and adventure use similar to Expedition Scout.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Seiko Prospex Fieldmaster Solar Lowercase Mens Watch SBDJ029
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Solar-powered rugged field watch similar size and function to Expedition Scout, designed for outdoor use with durable materials.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Skagen Dual Time Stainless Steel Watch
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Minimalist, urban fashion focus rather than rugged adventure style; stainless steel vs titanium.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Orient Men's Automatic 21 Dial Day/Date
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Mechanical automatic with day/date useful in daily wear; moderately rugged style but less focused on ultra-durability.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Skagen Men's Nillson Three-Hand Quartz Watch with Leather Strap
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Simple, minimalist quartz watch with leather strap but lacks rugged and adventure-focused features.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Tissot Men's Chrono XL Watch
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Quartz chronograph with classic style but more dress and chronograph focused rather than rugged field use.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Casio Men's Watch
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Generic Casio analog/quartz watches vary widely; if classic analog, modest similarity but generally less premium and rugged.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Men's Seiko 5 Sports Watch
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Automatic mechanical with sports and outdoor leaning design, robust and purposeful like the Expedition Scout.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Casio Men's Digital Watch
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Digital watch diverges from analog, traditional form and materials.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Seiko Prospex 1968 Diver's Modern Re-Interpretation GMT Men's SPB381
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Robust diver watch with GMT function, mechanical movement; shares durability and adventure focus though diver vs field style.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Bulova Men's Automatic Stainless Steel Watch 96A239
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Automatic mechanical with stainless steel case; more dressy style and less rugged construction.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Skagen Wrist Watch
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Skagen models typically minimalist and fashion focused with less rugged features or outdoor readiness.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Skagen watch SKW6446
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Specific Skagen model likely minimalist design; lacks rugged or adventure-focused features.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: SKAGEN DENMARK - WATCHES
scores_with_rationales.rationale: General brand mention for Skagen watches which typically focus on design fashion rather than rugged or titanium build watches.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Citizen Men's Eco-Drive Promaster Nighthawk Watch with Sikorsky
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Eco-Drive Promaster line is adventure and pilot oriented with robust features; mechanically and functionally similar though different use case focus.
